TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SearchScope extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the possible scopes for a directory search that is performed using the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher"> object.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.SearchScope Base = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Limits the search to the base object. The result contains a maximum of one object. When the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.AttributeScopeQuery%2A> property is specified for a search, the scope of the search must be set to F:System.DirectoryServices.SearchScope.Base?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.SearchScope OneLevel = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Searches the immediate child objects of the base object, excluding the base object.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.SearchScope Subtree = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Searches the whole subtree, including the base object and all its child objects. If the scope of a directory search is not specified, a F:System.DirectoryServices.SearchScope.Subtree?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True type of search is performed.
